document.full_text: vanquishing the team they couldn't beat for so long with a 16-0 run to end the game, miami topped boston 97-87 to win their east semifinal series wednesday night in five games.
document.title: heat 97, celtics 87: miami ousts boston and heads to east finals
lines_and_colors: vanquishing the team they couldn't beat for so long with a 16-0 run to end the game, miami topped boston 97-87 to win their east semifinal series wednesday night in five games.
